column2: "Hey, all you ARKS! Are you ready!?"

"Mitsuyoshi-san, thank you for that wonderful song!
We'll take it from here!"
"Thank you everybody! It's been a blast!"

"We hope this song brings you
the rainbow of your dreams!"

"Woah! I'm so fired up, maybe I'll go grind for rares too!
See you all in the free fields, my fellow ARKS!"

"Dance! Dance! Move to the rhythm and bounce!
(SORE SORE SORE)"

"Dance! Dance! Give in to the hot beat!
(Let's Dance)"

"Dance! Dance! It's nothing to be embarrassed about!
(SORE SORE SORE)"

"Dance! Dance! Can you say carnival?
(Haai! Haai! High! High! High! High!)"
"I want to see it! I gotta GET it!"

"Dance! Dance!\u3000That spinning lucky charm!
(SORE SORE SORE)"

"Dance! Dance!\u3000Give us the power to call down a miracle!
(Get Down)"

"Dance! Dance!\u3000It's too early to give up!
(SORE SORE SORE)"

"Dance! Dance!\u3000Raise the roof!
(Haai! Haai! High! High! High! High!)"
"No matter how many times we fall, get on up again!"
"I want to see it! I gotta GET it!"
"I want to see it! I gotta GET it!"
"First time I saw it, gotta admit I was amazed"
"'What the hell's this red box?' I said in a daze"
"Asked my bros, and so it goes, this was rare was craze-y"
"The minute I grabbed it, I knew that I nabbed it, the ultimate weapon, lady"
"Gotta give 'em praise, they're still grinding for days, trying to hunt down my baby"
